Original: Ah, this request. It is from the girl
sitting over there. The one with the
thick glasses...
[Page]
She says that she is a wandering
artist on a journey to find something
beautiful. You should talk to her.
[Page]
Now then, I await your swift return
with a report on what this "beautiful
thing" might be.
Translation: Ah, this request. It is from the girl
sitting over there. The one with the
thick glasses...
[Page]
She says that she is a wandering
artist on a journey to find something
beautiful. You should talk to her.
[Page]
Now then, I await your swift return
with a report on what this "beautiful
thing" might be.

Original: Welcome back. I could not help but
overhear... So you successfully
found the Snow Garden?
[Page]
A gleaming flower made of snow... How
romantic! It is nice to handle these
kinds of requests once in a while.
[Page]
I would love to see it for myself...
Though then again, I am sensitive to
the cold.
Translation: Welcome back. I could not help but
overhear... So you successfully
found the Snow Garden?
[Page]
A gleaming flower made of snow... How
romantic! It is nice to handle these
kinds of requests once in a while.
[Page]
I would love to see it for myself...
Though then again, I am sensitive to
the cold.

Original: As you move through the blizzard on
your skyship, you reach a hidden spot
where sunlight filters through.
[Page]
You emerge from the ship to find an
ocean of flower-like objects made of
snow. They sparkle in the sunlight...
[Page]
You know not how, but the snow has
hardened into flowery crystals. It is
a breathtaking sight...
Translation: As you move through the blizzard on
your skyship, you reach a hidden spot
where sunlight filters through.
[Page]
You emerge from the ship to find an
ocean of flower-like objects made of
snow. They sparkle in the sunlight...
[Page]
You know not how, but the snow has
hardened into flowery crystals. It is
a breathtaking sight...

Original: The natural spectacle of the snow
flowers still fascinates you. You
decide to return later...
Translation: The natural spectacle of the snow
flowers still fascinates you. You
decide to return later...

Original: This is the Snow Garden your client
wanted. Once you mark its location,
return to her at the bar.
Translation: This is the Snow Garden your client
wanted. Once you mark its location,
return to her at the bar.
